property.name: adduser
property.value: insert into pro_adduser values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: visituser
property.value: insert into pro_visituser values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: addmember
property.value: insert into pro_addmember values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: activemember
property.value: insert into pro_activemember values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: slvisitcount
property.value: select * from pro_visitcount order by date desc limit 1

property.name: slactivecount
property.value: select * from pro_activecount order by date desc limit 1

property.name: visitcount
property.value: insert into pro_visitcount values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: activecount
property.value: insert into pro_activecount values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: sessionnumber
property.value: insert into pro_sessionnumber values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: sessionlength
property.value: insert into pro_sessionlength values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: averagesessionlength
property.value: insert into pro_averagesessionlength values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: bigtable
property.value: insert into pro_bigtable values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE adduserCount = ?,visitCount = ?,userCount = ?,addmemberCount = ?,activeCount = ?,memberCount = ?,sessionnumberCount = ?,sessionlengthCount = ?,averagesessionlength = ?

property.name: adduserbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_adduserbrowser values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: activeuserbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_activeuserbrowser values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE activeusercount = ?,usercount = ?

property.name: addmemberbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_addmemberbrowser values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addmembercount = ?,membercount = ?

property.name: activememberbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_activememberbrowser values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: sessionnumberbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_sessionnumberbrowser values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?,average = ?

property.name: sessionlengthbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_sessionlengthbrowser values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dvalue = ?,count = ?

property.name: pvbrowser
property.value: insert into pro_pvbrowser values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?
